job_tasks.phrase: De opkomst van AI-technologie markeert een nieuw tijdperk, waarvan wij als WitteveenBos de meerwaarde optimaal willen benutten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase sets the business context and strategic intent for using AI, aligning with understanding business value.

job_tasks.phrase: Als generalist beschik jij over actuele kennis en kunde van zowel front end als back end.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions front-end and back-end skills, which are core to traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: En ben je op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen en trends op het gebied van AI.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to stay updated with AI trends, which falls under continuous learning.

job_tasks.phrase: In je rol als full stack AI developer fungeer je als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a bridging role, requiring interaction and communication between different groups.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met de ingenieurs en adviseurs signaleer je kansen voor het inzetten van AI, breng je vragen en wensen in kaart en analyseer je processen.
job_tasks.justification: Identifying opportunities for AI and mapping business needs are strategic and business-oriented tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Deze bevindingen zet je vervolgens om in passende AI-applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Converting findings into AI applications is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: met technieken als Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) en Agentic Frameworks.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions RAG and Agentic Frameworks, which are key techniques in Generative AI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: De afdeling is daarnaast verantwoordelijk voor integraal projectmanagement binnen de bedrijfsvoering, business intelligence en data-analyse en het implementeren van het werken onder architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Project management, working under architecture, and business intelligence/data analysis are related to the broader software development lifecycle and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: ervaring met Python en/of JavaScript voor web development;
job_tasks.justification: Experience with programming languages for web development is a core software engineering task.
A proactive personality implies initiative and ownership.
'Pioneering' indicates a drive for innovation and taking initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: En ben je op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen en trends op het gebied van AI.
soft_skills.justification: Staying updated with trends requires continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: fungeer je als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers.
soft_skills.justification: Acting as a connector implies communication and collaboration.
A proactive personality implies initiative and ownership.
'Pioneering' indicates a drive for innovation and taking initiative.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a 'full stack AI developer' who is a 'generalist' in generative AI. It requires a blend of traditional software engineering skills (front-end, back-end, web development, project management) and specific GenAI techniques like RAG and Agentic Frameworks. This balance between Macro-Category A (Software Engineering) and Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization), with a clear focus on generative AI, aligns best with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines the required blend of full-stack development and specific GenAI techniques (RAG, Agentic Frameworks). The role's description as a 'generalist' and 'full stack AI developer' is explicit. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the mention of 'no or little work experience' could suggest a junior role, though the tasks described are core GenAI responsibilities.
